BaseRules: ['Summer Lucky Star rewards can only be drawn once. Spend Celica Lottery Tickets to participate in the event, and drawn a certain number of times to earn additional rewards.', 'Complete event missions during the event to obtain Celica Lottery Tickets. The tickets will be automatically recycled after the event ends.']

['Wandering Waves rewards can only be drawn once. Spend Water Park Pass to participate in the event, and drawn a certain number of times to earn additional rewards.', 'Complete event missions during the event to obtain Water Park Pass. The tickets will be automatically recycled after the event ends.']

['Ebbtide Treasures rewards can only be drawn once. Spend Treasure Hunt Vouchers to participate in the event, and draw a certain number of times to earn extra rewards.', 'Complete event missions during the event to obtain Treasure Hunt Vouchers. The tickets will be automatically recycled after the event ends.']
